term.title: catalymetric titration

item.text: A titration process, which involves a catalyst, where the end-point is detected by the sudden increase or decrease of the rate of a reaction.

sources.item: PAC, 1993, 65, 2291. 'Nomenclature of kinetic methods of analysis (IUPAC Recommendations 1993)' on page 2293 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac199365102291)

term.citation: Citation: 'catalymetric titration' in IUPAC Compendium of Chemical Terminology, 5th ed. International Union of Pure and Applied Chemistry; 2025. Online version 5.0.0, 2025. 10.1351/goldbook.C00872

Users of these terms are encouraged to include the version of a term with its use and to check regularly for updates to term definitions that you are using.
